item.title: Element
item.description: Marker: IElement Inheritance: None Xamarin.Forms documentation: Element Class For details on how the control actually works, please refer to the Xamarin.Forms documentation. Important notes # This control can’t be instantiated on its own. Its properties and events are inherited by its descendants. Constructors # None Properties # automationId(value: string) Sets the automation identifier of the widget Events # onMounted(value: ‘msg) Listens for the widget being mounted onUnmounted(value: ‘msg) Listens for the widget being unmounted

item.title: Label
item.description: Inheritance: Element -> NavigableElement -> VisualElement -> View Xamarin.Forms documentation: Label Class For details on how the control actually works, please refer to the Xamarin.Forms documentation. Constructors # Constructors Description Label(text: string) Define a Label widget Properties # Properties Description characterSpacing(value: float) Sets the spacing between each character of the text font(?
